oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bragg's Headquarters on Missionary Ridge, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color tinted photograph of a section of Missionary Ridge known as General Bragg's Headquarters. An unpaved road leads to monuments and a tower surrounded by trees. Features a white border and undivided back. [No. 6303]
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Missionary Ridge (Tenn. and Ga.); Chattanooga (Tenn.); Hamilton County (Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Monuments & memorials; Towers; Trees
